name: Life of Delta - Support Adventures! Bundle
name_original: Life of Delta - Support Adventures! Bundle
description:
Includes:


The Life of Delta game
Embark on a journey through a vast post-apocalyptic environment, full of interesting characters and engaging puzzle games in this sci-fi point-and-click adventure game.

Life of Delta - Supporter Adventures! Pack
  • The complete Life of Delta soundtrack
  • Digital Art Book - a look at Life of Delta's art style and world
  • A walkthrough brochure for the game
